name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tubelator: AI Subtitles, Summaries & Transcript Export for YouTube

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI subtitles and summary for YouTube videos. Export YouTube transcripts and download subtitles.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
😓 Frustrated with YouTube's lack of subtitles or inaccurate [MUSIC] or [BLAH BLAH] captions?
😓 Fed up watching lengthy videos and struggling to locate the content you need?
😓 Having difficulties grasping video content because of language barriers?

Then you need Tubelator in your life! Your new AI companion for YouTube, embeds right into your video page. 🚀 

👉KEY FEATURES👈 
    🌐 Transcribe and translate any YouTube video between "98 languages" effortlessly. 
    📝 Copy or export YouTube transcripts in .srt and 12+ other different formats
    🎞️ Generate customizable word-by-word synced subtitles in your preferred language, works with any video on entire YouTube. 
    📝 Efficient skimming with word-by-word searchable and exportable transcripts with timestamps. 
    📚 Chapters and Summary for any YouTube video with accurate timestamps, saves time instead of watching whole content.
    📷 Envision feature transforms selected video scenes into captivating AI art. 
    🧑‍🤝‍🧑 Automatically detects available transcripts for every video.

🎯 HOW YOU CAN USE TUBELATOR 🎯
① Entertainment:
    🎬 Foreign Films: Enjoy instant subtitles for movies in your language which you always wanted to watch.
    🎵 Lyrics Clarity: Understand songs with accurate word-by-word subtitles and ditch YouTube [MUSIC] captions.

② Language Learning:
     🗣️ Immersive Learning: Watch videos with synced subtitles for language immersion in language of your choice.
     📘 Grammar Practice: Focus on language areas with precise timestamps.

③ Education:
    🛠️ Step-by-Step Guides: Easily follow tutorials with highlighted transcripts.
     📖 Efficient Skimming: Grasp essentials quickly with searchable transcripts and timestamps.
     🤝 Collaborative Study: Easily share subtitles and transcripts for effective group learning by just sharing a video link.

④ Interviews and Documentary:
     🔍 Clear Understanding: Transcribe and translate interviews for clarity.
     🎙️ Topic Focus: Navigate interviews efficiently with summarized insights and watch only the points of of your choice.

YouTube AI subtitles generator or summarizer extension is no longer a dream now when Tubelator AI is here. Your only generator for chapters, summary, subtitles and AI art, start generating with your new chrome extension NOW! 

You can see all the detailed features here on our official website: 
https://tubelator.com/#features

Thank you for using Tubelator AI! 😃

NOTE: This extension does NOT allow or permit the downloading of YouTube videos and does NOT include any such feature.
